title: inaiyaar unakku uNDO
sahitya: Inaiyar unakku oondo ippuviyil         Paninidi-dil bhaagyam tarum amma        anupallavi Tunai devi maha devan manohari         Tunba mellam teerkum dayapari   caraNamPaaril bhaktar-gal paniyum paratpari          Parindu varam tarulvai bhuvaneshwari          Gora paapangal agatrum gourimanohari          Bharani maravaan nin taalinai sundari
